Class SSODatabaseAuthenticator

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ephesoft.dcma.security.service.impl.SSODatabaseAuthenticator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AuthenticationService

    public class SSODatabaseAuthenticator
extends java.lang.Object
implements AuthenticationService
    Provides the implementation for AuthenticationService.

    It implements SSO authentication and authorisation.
